AzureBackupServerEngine.description: The backup engine type when Azure Backup Server is used to manage the backups.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMContainer.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing a classic-deployed virtual machine.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMProtectableItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing a classic VM.

AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific error information.

recommendations.description: List of localized recommendations for the error string.

AzureIaaSVMJob.description: The Azure IaaS VM workload-specifc job object.

actionsInfo.description: Gets or sets the state, or actions, applicable on this job. Examples of the actions are: Cancel or Retry.

duration.description: The time that elapsed during the execution of this job.

virtualMachineVersion.description: Specifies whether the backup item is a Classic VM or a Resource Manager VM.

AzureIaaSVMJob.title: AzureIaaSVMJob

AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo.description: Additional information for the Azure IaaS VM workload-specific job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non-localized error message for job execution.

progressPercentage.description: Indicates progress of the job. Null if it has not started or completed.

tasksList.description: List of tasks associated with this job.

AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo.title: AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo

AzureIaaSVMJobTaskDetails.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific job task details.

duration.description: The time elapsed for the task.

progressPercentage.description: The progress of the task, as a percentage.

AzureIaaSVMJobTaskDetails.title: AzureIaaSVMJobTaskDetails

AzureIaaSVMProtectedItem.description: This Azure VM workload-specific (also known as IaaS VM workload-specific) backup item has been backed up.

extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.description: The last backup operation status. The possible values are: Healthy or Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.description: The timestamp of the last backup operation for this backup item.

protectionState.description: The backup state of this backup item.

protectionStatus.description: The backup status of this backup item.

virtualMachineId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

AzureIaaSVMProtectedItem.title: AzureIaaSVMProtectedItem

AzureIaaSVMProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information for the Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM)-specific backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.description: Specifies if the backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

recoveryPointCount.description: The number of backup copies available for this backup item.

AzureIaaSVMProtectedItemExtendedInfo.title: AzureIaaSVMProtectedItemExtendedInfo

AzureIaaSVMProtectionPolicy.description: Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM) workload-specific backup policy.

retentionPolicy.description: The retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

schedulePolicy.description: The backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

AzureIaaSVMProtectionPolicy.title: AzureIaaSVMProtectionPolicy

extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

protectionState.description: The backup state of the backup item.

AzureSqlProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information for the Azure SQL specific backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

policyState.description: The state of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.description: The number of available backup copies for this backup item.

AzureSqlProtectionPolicy.description: The Azure SQL workload-specific backup policy.
AzureSqlProtectionPolicy.title: AzureSqlProtectionPolicy

secretUrl.description: Secret refers to Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK). The Secret can be unlocked by the key (or KEK).

secretVaultId.description: ID of the Key Vault where this Secret is stored.

startDate.description: Use backup copies created after this time.

BackupEngineBase.description: The base backup engine class. All workload-specific backup engines derive from this class.

backupEngineId.description: The ID of the backup engine.

backupEngineType.description: The type of the backup engine.

backupManagementType.description: The type of backup management associated with the backup engine.

canReRegister.description: The flag indicating whether the backup engine be registered again, once the engine has been initially registered.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the backup engine.

healthStatus.description: The backup status of the backup engine.

registrationStatus.description: The status of the backup engine registration with the Recovery Services vault.

objectType.description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

ClientScriptForConnect.description: Client script details for the file or folder restore.

osType.description: The operating system platform ("Windows" or "Linux") for which this file or folder restore client script works.

scriptContent.description: File content of the client script for file or folder restore.

scriptExtension.description: File extension of the client script for the file or folder restore. Some examples of the extension are: .ps1 and .sh.

ClientScriptForConnect.title: ClientScriptForConnect

daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

retentionDuration.description: The retention duration of retention policy.

retentionTimes.description: The retention times of retention policy.

recommendations.description: The list of localized recommendations for the error string.

actionsInfo.description: The state or actions applicable on this job, such as Cancel or Retry.

containerName.description: The name of the cluster or server protecting the current backup item, if any.

dpmServerName.description: DPM server name managing the backup item or backup job.

duration.description: The time elapsed for the job.

DpmJobExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on the DPM workload-specific job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non-localized error message on job execution.

tasksList.description: List of tasks associated with this job.

EncryptionDetails.description: Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

encryptionEnabled.description: Identifies whether the backup copy represents an encrypted VM at the time of backup.

kekUrl.description: URL of the Key Encryption Key (KEK).

kekVaultId.description: The ID of Key Vault where the Key Encryption Key (KEK) is stored.

secretKeyUrl.description: URL of the Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK).

secretKeyVaultId.description: The ID of Key Vault where the Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK), or Secret, is stored.

EncryptionDetails.title: EncryptionDetails

ExportJobsOperationResultInfo.description: This class is used to send blob details after exporting jobs.

blobSasKey.description: The Shared Access Signatures (SAS) key used to access the blob. The key expires after 15 minutes.

blobUrl.description: The URL of the blob. The serialized string, which is the list of jobs, is exported to this URL.

ExportJobsOperationResultInfo.title: ExportJobsOperationResultInfo

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup copy.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: The time when this backup copy was created.

GetProtectedItemQueryObject.description: This object filters the list of backup items.

expand.description: Specifies if the additional information should be provided for this item.

GetProtectedItemQueryObject.title: GetProtectedItemQueryObject

ILRRequest.title: ILRRequest

ILRRequestResource.description: The parameters to restore files or folders.
ILRRequestResource.title: ILRRequestResource

resourceGroup.description: The resource group name associated with the Recovery Services vault.

virtualMachineId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager URL of the virtual machine represented by this Azure IaaS VM container.

virtualMachineVersion.description: Specifies whether the container represents a classic or a Resource Manager-deployed virtual machine.

virtualMachineId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the virtual machine.

IaaSVMProtectableItem.title: IaaSVMProtectableItem

IaasVMBackupRequest.description: This is an Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM) workload-specific backup request.

recoveryPointExpiryTimeInUTC.description: The backup copy will expire after the time specified. The time is in UTC format.

IaasVMBackupRequest.title: IaasVMBackupRequest

IaasVMILRRegistrationRequest.description: Restore files or folders from a backup copy, or recovery point, of an IaaS (or Azure) VM.

recoveryPointId.description: The ID of the IaaS VM recovery point used to restore the files or folders.

renewExistingRegistration.description: Whether to renew the existing registration with the iSCSI server.

virtualMachineId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the VM used to restore the files or folders.

IaasVMILRRegistrationRequest.title: IaasVMILRRegistrationRequest

IaasVMRecoveryPoint.description: Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM) workload-specific backup copy.

isInstantILRSessionActive.description: Answer to the question - Is the session to recover items from this backup copy still active.

isSourceVMEncrypted.description: Identifies whether the VM was encrypted when the backup copy is created.

keyAndSecret.description: Required details for recovering an encrypted VM. Applicable only when IsSourceVMEncrypted is true.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: The date and time when the backup copy was created.

sourceVMStorageType.description: The storage type for the VM whose backup copy was created.

IaasVMRecoveryPoint.title: IaasVMRecoveryPoint

affinityGroup.description: The affinity group associated with the VM to be restored. Affinity groups are used only for Classic-deployed virtual machines.

createNewCloudService.description: Asks the question if a new cloud service should be created while restoring the VM. If the answer is false, the VM is restored to the same cloud service.

encryptionDetails.description: If the VM was encrypted at the time of backup, these details are needed.

recoveryPointId.description: The ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

region.description: The region where the virtual machine is restored.

sourceResourceId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the VM being recovered.

storageAccountId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the storage account where the VM will be restored.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID is the identifier for the VM to be restored. For Classic VMs the subnet ID would be {VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName}, and for the Resource Manager VMs, the subnet ID would be the Resource Manager resource ID used to represent the subnet.

targetDomainNameId.description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the domain name to be associated with the VM being restored. Use the Resource Manager ID to identify the domain, only for Classic-deployed virtual machines.

targetResourceGroupId.description:
The Resource Manager ID of the resource group you're creating for this VM and other artifacts.
    For example: /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}

targetVirtualMachineId.description:
The complete Resource Manager ID of the VM that will be created.
            For example: /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

virtualNetworkId.description:
This is the virtual network ID of the vnet that is attached to the virtual machine.
            Your join action permissions are validated during the linked access.

InstantItemRecoveryTarget.description: Target details for the file or folder restore.
InstantItemRecoveryTarget.title: InstantItemRecoveryTarget

Job.description: Defines workload-agnostic properties for a job.

backupManagementType.description: The backup management type for the current job.

entityFriendlyName.description: The friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.

jobType.description: This property is the discriminator for deciding between the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

Job.title: Job

JobQueryObject.description: The filters to list the jobs.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup managmenent for the job.

endTime.description: The time when the job ends. The value is in UTC.

jobId.description: The ID of the job. Each jobID is unique.

startTime.description: The time when the job starts. The value is in UTC.

JobQueryObject.title: JobQueryObject

JobResource.description: Defines the workload-agnostic properties for a job.
JobResource.title: JobResource

KEKDetails.description: The Key Encryption Key (KEK) is the encryption key for the Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK).

keyBackupData.description: Key Backup Data refers to Key Encryption Key (KEK) data.

keyUrl.description: Key refers to the Key Encryption Key (KEK). The KEK is the Key to unlock the Secret.

keyVaultId.description: Key Vault ID identifies where the KEK is stored.

KEKDetails.title: KEKDetails

KeyAndSecretDetails.description:
BEK stands for Bitlocker Encryption Key.
 KEK stands for Key Encryption Key. KEK is the encryption key used to protect the Secret for the BEK
  If the VM is encrypted, then the service stores the following details :
  1. Secret(BEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultID.
            2. Key(KEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultID.
   It is possible for the BEK and KEK to have different vaultIDs.

kekDetails.description: The Key Encryption Key (KEK) is the encryption key for the Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK).

KeyAndSecretDetails.title: KeyAndSecretDetails

dailySchedule.description: Daily retention schedule of the backup policy.

monthlySchedule.description: Monthly retention schedule of the backup policy.

weeklySchedule.description: Weekly retention schedule of the backup policy.

yearlySchedule.description: Yearly retention schedule of the backup policy.

canReRegister.description: The container can be registered one more time.

policyName.description: The backup policy associated with this container.

ProtectionContainer.description: The base class for a container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

backupManagementType.description: The backup managemenent type for the container.

containerType.description:
The type assigned to the container. The values to use for each of these propertes are:
1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines
2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines
3. Windows machines (like Azure Backup Server and DPM) is Windows
4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer.

healthStatus.description: The status of the container's health.

protectableObjectType.description: The protectable object type associated with the container.

registrationStatus.description: The container's registration status with the Recovery Services vault.

count.description:
Count of the duration types. Retention duration is determined by the combining the Count times and durationType. 
   For example, if Count = 3 and durationType = Weeks, then the retention duration is three weeks.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: The number of times per week the schedule runs.

actions.title: BackupEngines_Get
actions.description: The backup management servers registered to a Recovery Services vault. This returns a pageable list of servers.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: Use this filter to choose the specific backup management server. backupManagementType { AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql }.

actions.title: ProtectionContainerRefreshOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Provides the result of the refresh operation triggered by the BeginRefresh operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the container.

operationId.description: The operation ID used for this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectionContainers_Get
actions.description: Gets details of the specific container registered to your Recovery Services vault.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the container.

containerName.description: The container name used for this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectionContainerOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Gets the result of any operation on the container.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the container.

containerName.description: The container name used for this GET operation.

operationId.description: The operation ID used for this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectedItems_Delete
actions.description: Used to disable the backup job for an item within a container. This is an asynchronous operation. To learn the status of the request, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The backup item to be deleted.

actions.title: ProtectedItems_Get
actions.description: Provides the details of the backup item. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The backup item name used in this GET operation.

$filter.description: expand eq {extendedinfo}. This filter enables you to choose (or filter) specific items in the list of backup items.

actions.title: ProtectedItems_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: This operation enables an item to be backed up, or modifies the existing backup policy information for an item that has been backed up. This is an asynchronous operation. To learn the status of the operation, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of the backup item.

actions.title: Backups_Trigger
actions.description: Triggers the backup job for the specified backup item. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation, call GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of backup item used in this POST operation.

actions.title: ProtectedItemOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Gets the result of any operation on the backup item.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of backup item used in this GET operation.

operationId.description: The OperationID used in this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectedItemOperationStatuses_Get
actions.description: Gets the status of an operation such as triggering a backup or restore. The status can be: In progress, Completed, or Failed. You can refer to the OperationStatus enum for all the possible states of the operation. Some operations create jobs. This method returns the list of jobs associated with the operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of backup item used in this GET operation.

operationId.description: The OperationID used in this GET operation.

actions.title: RecoveryPoints_List
actions.description: Lists the recovery points, or backup copies, for the specified backup item.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of backup item used in this GET operation.

$filter.description: startDate eq {yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM} and endDate { yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM}.

actions.title: RecoveryPoints_Get
actions.description: Provides the backup data for the RecoveryPointID. This is an asynchronous operation. To learn the status of the operation, call the GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with backup item.

containerName.description: The container name associated with backup item.

protectedItemName.description: The name of the backup item used in this GET operation.

recoveryPointId.description: The RecoveryPointID associated with this GET operation.

actions.title: ItemLevelRecoveryConnections_Provision
actions.description: Provisions a script which invokes an iSCSI connection to the backup data. Executing this script opens File Explorer which displays the recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation. To get the provisioning status, call GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup items.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup items.

protectedItemName.description: The name of the backup item whose files or folders are to be restored.

recoveryPointId.description: The recovery point ID for backup data. The iSCSI connection will be provisioned for this backup data.

actions.title: Restores_Trigger
actions.description: Restores the specified backup data. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of this API call, use GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup items.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup items.

protectedItemName.description: The backup item to be restored.

recoveryPointId.description: The recovery point ID for the backup data to be restored.

actions.title: ItemLevelRecoveryConnections_Revoke
actions.description: Revokes an iSCSI connection which can be used to download a script. Executing this script opens a file explorer displaying all recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the backup items. The value allowed is Azure.

containerName.description: The container name associated with the backup items.

protectedItemName.description: The name of the backup items whose files or folders will be restored.

recoveryPointId.description: The string that identifies the recovery point. The iSCSI connection will be revoked for this protected data.

actions.title: ProtectionContainers_Refresh
actions.description: Discovers the containers in the subscription that can be protected in a Recovery Services vault. This is an asynchronous operation. To learn the status of the operation, use the GetRefreshOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

fabricName.description: The fabric name associated with the container.

actions.title: Jobs_List
actions.description: Provides a pageable list of jobs.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: The following equation can be used to filter the list of jobs based on status, type, start date, and end date. status eq { InProgress , Completed , Failed , CompletedWithWarnings , Cancelled , Cancelling } and backupManagementType eq {AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql } and operation eq { ConfigureBackup , Backup , Restore , DisableBackup , DeleteBackupData } and jobId eq {guid} and startTime eq { yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM } and endTime eq { yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM }.

actions.title: ExportJobsOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Gets the result of the operation triggered by the ExportJob API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

operationId.description: The ID associated with the export job.

actions.title: JobDetails_Get
actions.description: Gets extended information associated with the job.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

jobName.description: Name of the job associated with this GET operation.

actions.title: JobCancellations_Trigger
actions.description: Cancels the job. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the cancellation, call the GetCancelOperationResult API.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

jobName.description: Name of the job to cancel.

actions.title: JobOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Gets the result of the operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

jobName.description: Job name associated with this GET operation.

operationId.description: OperationID associated with this GET operation.

actions.title: Jobs_Export
actions.description: Exports all jobs for a given Shared Access Signatures (SAS) URL. The SAS URL expires within 15 minutes of its creation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: The OData filter options. status eq { InProgress , Completed , Failed , CompletedWithWarnings , Cancelled , Cancelling } and backupManagementType eq {AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql } and operation eq { ConfigureBackup , Backup , Restore , DisableBackup , DeleteBackupData } and jobId eq {guid} and startTime eq { yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM } and endTime eq { yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss PM }.

actions.title: BackupOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Provides the status of the delete operations, for example, deleting a backup item. Once the operation starts, the response status code is Accepted. The response status code remains in this state until the operation reaches completion. On successful completion, the status code changes to OK. This method expects OperationID as an argument. OperationID is part of the Location header of the operation response.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

actions.title: BackupOperationStatuses_Get
actions.description: Gets the status of an operation such as triggering a backup or restore. The status can be In progress, Completed or Failed. You can refer to the OperationStatus enum for all the possible states of an operation. Some operations create jobs. This method returns the list of jobs when the operation is complete.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicies_List
actions.description: Lists the backup policies associated with the Recovery Services vault. The API provides parameters to Get scoped results.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: The following equation can be used to filter the list of backup policies. backupManagementType eq {AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql}.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicies_Delete
actions.description: Deletes the specified backup policy from your Recovery Services vault. This is an asynchronous operation. Use the GetPolicyOperationResult API to Get the operation status.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

policyName.description: The name of the backup policy to be deleted.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicies_Get
actions.description: Gets the details of the backup policy associated with the Recovery Services vault. This is an asynchronous operation. Use the GetPolicyOperationResult API to Get the operation status.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

policyName.description: The backup policy name used in this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicies_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or modifies a backup policy. This is an asynchronous operation. Use the GetPolicyOperationResult API to Get the operation status.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

policyName.description: The backup policy to be created.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicyOperationResults_Get
actions.description: Provides the result of an operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

policyName.description: The backup policy name used in this GET operation.

operationId.description: The ID associated with this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectionPolicyOperationStatuses_Get
actions.description: Provides the status of the asynchronous operations like backup or restore. The status can be: in progress, completed, or failed. You can refer to the Operation Status enumeration for the possible states of an operation. Some operations create jobs. This method returns the list of jobs associated with the operation.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

policyName.description: The backup policy name used in this GET operation.

operationId.description: The ID associated with this GET operation.

actions.title: ProtectableItems_List
actions.description: Based on the query filter and the pagination parameters, this operation provides a pageable list of objects within the subscription that can be protected.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: Using the following query filters, you can sort a specific backup item based on: type of backup item, status, name of the item, and more.  providerType eq { AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql } and status eq { NotProtected , Protecting , Protected } and friendlyName {name} and skipToken eq {string which provides the next set of list} and topToken eq {int} and backupManagementType eq { AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql }.

actions.title: ProtectedItems_List
actions.description: Provides a pageable list of all items in a subscription, that can be protected.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: itemType eq { VM , FileFolder , AzureSqlDb , SQLDB , Exchange , Sharepoint , DPMUnknown } and providerType eq { AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql } and policyName eq {policyname} and containerName eq {containername} and backupManagementType eq { AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql }.

actions.title: ProtectionContainers_List
actions.description: Lists the containers registered to the Recovery Services vault.

vaultName.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

$filter.description: The following equation is used to sort or filter the containers registered to the vault. providerType eq {AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql} and status eq {Unknown, NotRegistered, Registered, Registering} and friendlyName eq {containername} and backupManagementType eq {AzureIaasVM, MAB, DPM, AzureBackupServer, AzureSql}.
